edu.iu.dsc.tws.tsched.spi.common

Class TaskSchedulerContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.dsc.tws.api.config.Context
      • edu.iu.dsc.tws.tsched.spi.common.TaskSchedulerContext

  • public class TaskSchedulerContext
extends Context
    This class is to represent the default values for the task instances and task scheduler logical container values.
